test.name: Open the browser and the website and check if you can access the article "Hello world!"

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance. Use this keyword for quick experiments or debugging sessions. Use `New Page` directly instead of `Open Browser` for production and automated execution. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Browser and related concepts.
kw.msg: Open Browser is for quick experimentation and debugging only. Use New Page for production.

{"acceptDownloads": false, "ignoreHTTPSErrors": false, "bypassCSP": false, "deviceScaleFactor": 1.0, "isMobile": false, "hasTouch": false, "javaScriptEnabled": true, "offline": false, "hideRfBrowser": false}
Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: http://localhost/wordpress/

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Wait Until Network Is Idle
kw.doc: Waits until there has been at least one instance of 500 ms of no network traffic on the page after loading.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser. Activated browser is set to first active browser. Closes all context and pages belonging to this browser. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Browser and related concepts.

errors.msg: Open Browser is for quick experimentation and debugging only. Use New Page for production.
